  ## `ToString` <a name="ToString" id="cdktf.LazyBase.toString"></a>

  Return a string representation of this resolvable object.

  # Properties <a name="Properties" id="Properties"></a>
  
  | **Name** | **Type** | **Description** |
  | --- | --- | --- |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.LazyBase.property.creationStack">CreationStack</a></code> | <code>string[]</code> | The creation stack of this resolvable which will be appended to errors thrown during resolution. |
  
  ---
  
  ## `CreationStack`<sup>Required</sup> <a name="CreationStack" id="cdktf.LazyBase.property.creationStack"></a>
  
  ```csharp
  public string[] CreationStack { get; }
  ```
  
  - *Type:* string[]
  
  The creation stack of this resolvable which will be appended to errors thrown during resolution.
  
  If this returns an empty array the stack will not be attached.
